markdownRemark.html: It is situated on a private residential estate near to Chiclana de la Frontera. The complex has two well maintained golf courses, suitable for all levels. The two courses are Sea and Pines, the first is more technical and the second more fun. There is a beautiful clubhouse, with good facilities.

frontmatter.title: IBEROSTAR Novo Sancti Petri Golf Club

There is a beautiful clubhouse, with good facilities.
